titles.title: To amend the Communications Act of 1934 to provide that an owner or operator of a social media service that hinders the display of user-generated content shall be treated as a publisher or speaker of such content, and for other purposes.
Biased Algorithm Deterrence Act of 2018
Biased Algorithm Deterrence Act of 2018
Biased Algorithm Deterrence Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
